biotools.summary: Scientific database for the molecular biology and genetics of the yeast Saccharomyces cerevisiae. The information in it includes functional annotations, mapping and sequence information, protein domains and structure, expression data, mutant phenotypes, physical and genetic interactions and the primary literature from which these data are derived. Phenotypes and genetic interaction data are also annotated and displayed.

bioschemas.name: Saccharomyces genome database (SGD)
